content: See you next time when we get lost, Bhan!

I, Bhadra, am about, to arrive, at your place!
Got it? Got. It. Right?!
Perfect, wait for me, bhan!

Before heading back to pack,
I've gotta crack open all the rocks around here!
Let's go for broke!

Your Planette?
Is it a place filled with the aroma of meat stew and rare gems everywhere?

Whoa, that's wild, bhan! Such a huge rock just got on track!
Oh, my dear Compania...

I never stick around in one place for long,
Always gotta prowl around and explore~
